Class DestinationCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Card.Card
      • Model.Card.PointsCard

  • public class DestinationCard
extends PointsCard
    a class that represents a Destination card in the game
    Author:
    Nikos Gounakis

        Constructor :
        Precondition :p must be a valid player object,imagepath must lead to the correct jpg file,score must be valid
        Postcondition :creates a new destination card
        Parameters:
        p - the player that the card will belongs to
        imagepath - the path of the card's image
        score - the score of the card
        colors - the arraylist of the colors needed to buy this card
